headline: 4 Industrial Manufacturing Stocks to Buy Despite Industry Headwinds
summary: Persistent weakness in the manufacturing sector weighs on the Zacks Manufacturing - General Industrial industry's near-term prospects. PH, FLS, WTS and HLIO are a few stocks investors may consider buying.
